name: Land builderz
description:
Project Page: https://redsgamestudio.weebly.com/island-builders.html

This is a small island building game made for the Support Indie 2020 Game Jam!

Basic Controls:

A and D to rotate buildings when placing them.

Whats new:

  • Fixed a bug where saving and loading didn't saved and loaded all the buildings
  • Fixed a bug where raid wont loot and take damage
  • Added a loading screen

This game is all about progress makes you weaker, each time you build a building, you gain points. The more you build, the weaker you become!

Raids will appear and loot you, attacks on raids are automatic.
